english.segment1: I will bless You Lord. My Saviour I worship You. Jesus You are my one desire. I live for You
english.segment2: The nations will turn to You. They'll bow down in worship. The heavens declare that You are. King of all the earth
english.segment3: Holy Holy. Lord God Almighty. Forever I will worship You. I will worship You. Holy Holy. Lord God Almighty. Forever I will worship You. I will worship You. My King
english.segment4: I will enter Your courts. With praises, all of my days. There's no greater reward than. Just to see Your face
english.segment5: Holy Holy. Lord God Almighty. Forever I will worship You. I will worship You. Holy Holy. Lord God Almighty. Forever I will worship You. I will worship You. My King.
